title: MIBI-preprocess-data pipeline parameters
description: Sub pipeline within the MIBI pipeline to preprocess output from QuPath for XGBoost model training.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

batch_name.description: Batch name used to label output files.

output_folder.description: Where preprocessed files will be stored. The folder will be created if it doesn't already exist.

qupath_data.description: The raw data exported from QuPath to be preprocessed.

cell_types_to_remove.description: A comma-delimited list of cell types identified that you wish to remove. E.g., "B cells,CD4 T cells".

change_to.description: The label assigned to celltypes that you have flagged for removal. Default: Other.

additional_meta_data.description: A comma-delimited list of additional metadata columns you wish to keep.

unwanted_markers.description: A comma-delimited list of markers you want to remove from the phenotyping.

unwanted_compartments.description: A comma-delimited list of compartments you want to remove from the phenotyping.

unwanted_statistics.description: A comma-delimited list of statistics you want to remove from the phenotyping.

preprocess_script.description: That path where the preprocess script is located.
